challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Ni ikaslea nintzen, baina orain irakaslea naiz.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: I was a student, but now I am a teacher.

challenges.formattedSolution: Ni ikaslea nintzen, baina orain irakaslea naiz.
I was a student, but now I am a teacher.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Ni turista nintzen, baina orain tour gida naiz.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: I was a tourist, but now I am a tour guide.

challenges.formattedSolution: Ni turista nintzen, baina orain tour gida naiz.
I was a tourist, but now I am a tour guide.

challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Zu gidaria zinen, baina orain irakaslea zara.
